channel.title: Runserver error
channel.description:
i get this error in my runserver:
Starting RS2LegendzPkz on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "1 000 6809" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:122) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:29)
what do i do?

item.title: Runserver error
item.dc:creator: @mage_owner mage_owner
item.description:
@mage_owner wrote:

I got that same error…i just gave up and started a new source lol…but what bobby says seems about right and just try searching…
and in the find window…just hit tab then enter…or space then enter should work -.-

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver error

item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

when you added items to a shop u used spaces. in most .cfg’s you cant use spaces, only tabs
